p:
As reported, in situ detection of H 2O 2 and O 2 – was tested with some modifications.
59 Three leaf discs exposed to different salt treatments were punched out and vacuum infiltrated with 10 mL of 1 mg mL –1 of DAB solution for 2 h. After infiltration, using boiling ethanol (95%), the leaves were cleaned for 30 min and H 2O 2 was detected using DAB staining. The accumulation of O 2 – in leaves after different periods of treatment was determined using 10–2 M NBT reduction. The leaf discs were then vacuum infiltrated for 2 h using 10 mL of NBT and cleaned for 30 min using boiling ethanol (95%).
